title: Interpretation of a dream about washing a child’s feces for a married woman

preview.html: But once the dreamer saw that he was cleaning the child, whether it was a stranger or his son, cleaning him from the feces, then these are symbols and signs that we will list in this article from gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing that I am washing a child from the feces in a dream about a single girl. Seeing a single girl cleaning A child from feces in a dream. It means that he will get rid of some things that make him angry with others. And if an unmarried girl sees that she is cleaning the child from feces, then this feces will emit a foul odor in the dream. The vision may indicate a feeling of guilt towards a situation or a woman who With it, but she does not return to it again. Seeing the child has been cleaned of feces, and she was happy about that, symbolizes that she is not forced to do this in the dream. It is a sign that she is trying to improve the insightful behavior of everyone around her. Whereas if she sees an unmarried girl In a dream, she cleans the child of feces with water. The vision indicated that she will get rid of her friends who did things that could hurt her. If an unmarried girl sees herself getting rid of the child’s chair and throwing it on the street in a dream. He harms some people by word or deed, and God Almighty knows best. A married woman’s dream that she is cleaning her child from feces was interpreted in a dream. He will get rid of some things that bother some people. If a married woman sees that she is washing a child from feces She was not satisfied or did not accept to do that in the dream. She has some actions or actions that her husband is doing that she is not satisfied with or God is forcing her to do. As for the married woman, she sees herself taking the child’s chair and throwing it in the garbage or any place designated for that without cleaning the child. In a dream. The sign of the vision is that there are many things that the dreamer is doing, but they do not satisfy her. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a child from feces with soap in a married woman’s dream. Which indicates the stability that she was seeking will be her share, God willing. Seeing a child’s chair in A foul smell and a married woman does not clean it in a dream. It is a sign that the dreamer is exposed to some problems and difficulties, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a man washing a child from feces and its meaning: Seeing a married man cleaning a child from feces in a dream. It is a sign that she is doing some difficult things that The man does it and sees it, but it is as simple as what he sees. As for the vision of cleaning the child from his excrement, the married man is also dirty in the dream. The vision indicates that the dreamer will get a lot of money. But if the married man sees that he is cleaning the child from the excrement, then he will Being tired or unable to do so in a dream. He will do a wonderful job on his own and will have wonderful job stability. If a married man sees that a child has thrown away his clothes in a dream. He will receive a lot of blessings in food and abundant money by the grace of Almighty God. Seeing a child’s excrement in a man’s dream. Married. It is evidence that he gets what he wants or gets what he wants

title: Interpretation of a dream about carrying the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, or a pregnant woman

preview.html: After that, we explain the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a marriage contract in a dream, and we explain the interpretations of this vision, which differ depending on whether the dreamer is a man and an unmarried girl. A married or pregnant woman with the following information: Interpretation of the Qur’anic contract in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of the marriage contract in a dream differs if the dreamer in his dream performs his marriage contract with a person he knows in reality or an unknown person. Interpretation of the Qur’anic term in a dream for a manIf the man sees in his dream that He marries a beautiful girl he knows in the real world, as this is an indication of achieving what he desired and achieving his goals, whether in his emotional or professional life. If he sees that he is getting married and is forced to do so, this indicates the pressures and problems that he will face in the coming days, which will steal his will and force him to do certain things in his life. If in his dream he contracts a marriage contract with a divorced woman or a widow, this indicates the coming of relief after hardships and severe pain. Location. But if it is one of his mahrams, such as his sister, mother, or daughter, it is a sign of his prestigious status and honorable position among his family and relatives. The interpretation varies according to the religion of the woman with whom the marriage contract is being concluded in the dream. Interpretation of the marriage contract in a dream for an unmarried girl, if she sees an unmarried woman in Her dream is that she is marrying someone she does not know, then this indicates joy and happiness in her coming days and happy news... in scandal, and God knows best. Interpretation of the marriage contract for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is concluding her marriage contract with a man she does not know, then this indicates her closeness to her husband and ten full years. With love and tenderness. God willing. Interpretation of the Qur’anic contract for a pregnant woman: Her vision is not good if you know it, as it indicates difficulties, worries, and fatigue, but if she does not know it, this is good news for the health and safety of her fetus as well. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we will take your comments at the bottom of the article and we will provide you with the interpretation in As soon as possible

title: The meaning of accusation and admonition in a dream. Interpretation of seeing reproach in a dream

preview.html: The encyclopedia presents to you the following article “The meaning of blame and reprimand in a dream. Interpretation of seeing reproach in a dream”. A sign of reconciliation and ending strife and discord? Or is it the result of excessive thinking, all these questions come to mind a lot and the viewer does not know the answer. The interpretation of warning in a dream means the way a person expresses his sadness and distress from another person, who may be a loved one, a friend or a relative, trying to blame him and warn him of the inappropriate or wrong behavior committed against him. Which shows the soul from what afflicted it with sadness and corrects it as well as the relationship between the two parties returns to what it was before. What was said before about reproach relates to the real life of a person in his relationship with those around him, but in the world of visions and dreams we find that the matter is different, as reproach may come to the fortune teller in a dream. A living person, as it can come to him from the deceased, and each of these cases and others has its own interpretation, which we will present in detail in the following paragraphs, so follow us. The meaning of accusation and preaching in a dream as narrated by Ibn Sirin God Almighty said in his beloved book, and he is the most sincere of speakers: “The soul is a sign of evil except for what my Lord has mercy on.” Therefore, Ibn Sirin explains that whoever finds in a dream that he accuses someone of a certain act or saying, this is a sign to the fortune teller that he has committed this act in reality. It may be a sign of the confusion of the beholder and his inability to make his decision, and mixing things up on him, which exposes him to blame and the blame of others, and he must resort to God to get him out of this matter with His command. Mercy. And leads him to the right path. Interpretation of reproach in a dream The following is the interpretation of the dream of warning as narrated by the most famous interpreters of dreams, including Imam Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Sirin believes that reprimand in a dream indicates that the dreamer will fall into confusion and his inability to choose between what is more appropriate for him and what is not appropriate. Reprimand in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is one of the fickle and hesitant personalities, which makes him fall into many mistakes that cause him problems, and thus will burden him with responsibilities and warnings from those around him. One of the interpretations taken for the dreamer's vision is that he warns the one who made a mistake that the dreamer himself is the one who commits this mistake, and God knows best. Al-Nabulsi believes that one of the interpretations of warning in a dream is that the dreamer violates his vows and does not fulfill his promise, so he is blamed and cursed by people. Ibn Sirin says that the dreamer's reprimand of someone he knows in a dream, whether a relative or a friend, is an indication of the strength of the bond and emotion that unites them, and the same applies when he sees that this person is the one who is being blamed, then he may feel sorry for something he has done The dreamer is against him unintentionally or intentionally. The meaning of accusation and reproach in a dream for Al-Nabulsi Accusation and preaching are among what came in the Holy Quran, as God Almighty said in his beloved book: “Do not blame me and do not blame yourselves.” Al-Nabulsi believes that accusation and reproach in a dream indicate that the dreamer does not fulfill the promises he made to others. This dream also indicates that the dreamer is moving away from the path of God Almighty and heading towards the path of Satan, who misleads him from

title: Learn about the interpretation of magic in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about magic? Interpretation of a dream about magic in a dream It shows many warnings and the dreamer must look at it very carefully so as not to be seriously harmed, and the great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Nabulsi have interpreted this symbol, and to learn about the many secrets and mysteries that the vision contains, it is necessary to follow this article to the end. You have a dream that confuses you and you are waiting for it .. Google Egyptian site for interpreting dreams Interpretation of a dream about magic Ibn Shaheen explained that magic indicates falsifying facts and the dreamer's neglect of falsehood and misguidance. Or not: If the dreamer sees magic in his office at work, this confirms that someone hates him at work and will conspire against him, and he must be careful from now on. Second: If the magic is inside the house, it may be from the dreamer's family or family with the intention of destroying his life and disrupting his affairs. Third: The most dangerous type of magic that the dreamer finds in the toilet of his house, and this indicates that black magic affects him seriously in his marriage, career, money and health as well. And if the dreamer sees someone mocking the genie in a dream and asking him to destroy His life, this is stronger than what we see in the dream related to magic, and this indicates the severity of the magic that affects the dreamer, and he may be afflicted with it for long periods of his life and it is difficult to deal with it, but with continued prayer and reading the Qur’an and Surat Al-Baqarah in particular, the dreamer will succeed in expelling this jinn. When the dreamer sees the magic process being performed on him from beginning to end, as he sees the person who went to perform magic on him and saw the magician narrating his strange satanic actions, this indicates a close betrayal of the person. The dreamer deals with it in his life. Interpretation of a dream about magic by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: If the dreamer sees that he is bewitched, and acts strangely due to the complete control of magic over him, then the vision indicates the danger that the dreamer falls into and may affect him for some time. The owner of the vision loves to travel and get to know new and different cultures of his country, if he sees a magician in his dream, this indicates an increase in the number of travel trips that he will take in the next few moments and will enjoy them all. If the dreamer sees magic in his dream and breaks it, then the dream shows the following: Or not: The patient who dreams of removing magic and getting rid of it and his life returns to normal and bright as it was before the magic, this indicates that he was sick and God will give him health and wellness. Second: If the dreamer left his country many years ago, and saw this dream, he will not be absent from his family again and will return to them with food and kindness. Third: As for the unmarried young man, if the spell that struck him in the dream is broken, he is ready to get married soon. Interpretation of a dream about magic for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees a man performing magic on her, he is a person of bad character And he wants to control her actions and completely control her, so he will follow bad ways to reach his despicable goal. He can harm her with magic so that she is under his control and he can do with her whatever he wants. When a girl dreams of a woman bewitching her, this indicates that she is a harmful lady who wants to tarnish her reputation and ruin her life.

He can harm her with magic until she is under his control and he can do whatever he wants with her. When a girl dreams of a woman who bewitches her, this indicates that she is a harmful woman who wants to distort her reputation and ruin her real life.

title: The interpretation of seeing a broken car in a dream has different interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a crashed car in a dream has different interpretations. For many people, the car is considered one of their valuable and important possessions that makes it easy for them to carry out many of their daily tasks, and they want to protect it and not expose it to damage because the cost of repairing the damage is high. Seeing a car accident in a dream is one of the dreams that worries the viewer. Knowing that there is a danger around him that threatens his safety and the safety of his property, in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a broken car in a dream with different interpretations.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a broken car in a dreamAlthough dream interpretation scholars lived at a time when traditional and primitive means of transportation were widespread Broadly speaking, modern interpretation scholars have stated that the explanations given by previous interpretations regarding transmission can be applied to these modern means that we use today. But with some minor differences that should add a little explanation. To understand this in a dream, jurists see it as a sign of a person’s life, his diligence and diligence, and it is also a sign of the money that the priest obtains, as it is said: It is a sign of the future, and others reported that it is a sign of An open-air travel trip. Prophet. If you see it in a beautiful and precise way and in cheerful colors, then it is a sign of the goodness that the dreamer will receive in all of these previous matters, but if it is in a bad way or the dreamer sees it in a state of disaster, then this dream is not considered a sign of kindness at all. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a car accident in a dream. Many commentators have worked hard to find the most accurate interpretations of this vision and have reported the following: If the fortuneteller finds that in a dream a car crashed while he was inside it, then this is a sign of the harm that befalls him, whether at work, or by depriving him of the money that was With him. If the dreamer suffers some injuries or fractures in the dream as a result of a car accident, then his dream is a sign of his illness due to the damage that will happen to him. He may get sick as a result of his frustration with the interruption of work or the loss of some sources of money that he previously had. Interpretation of the dream of surviving A car accident in a dream: If the fortuneteller survived a terrible accident or his car crashed, it is a sign that he survived many crises and problems that he was already facing. This dream is a sign that the dreamer will face many difficulties, but he will survive, thanks to God and the generosity of God Almighty. This is because he glorified God for his salvation and satisfaction. As for sadness over the car accident or sadness over the damage he suffered, the dream is a sign of the serious losses that will occur in life, whether they are material or moral losses. The dreamer is very sad after surviving a car accident in a dream. An indication of the state of sadness that he will feel, due to his loss of some blessings that he did not appreciate. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a car accident and an accident in a dream: A car that overturned in the dreamer is a sign that he will face many unpleasant ordeals in life. These fluctuations can be either in Work, study, or financial conditions, so it transforms

title: I dreamed that I was kneading dough

preview.html: I dreamed that I was kneading dough through a website, seeing roy2a.com Dough is an amount of flour or flour and water used in many baked goods, the most important of which is making bread, which is one of the most important components of the main meal in food, and something similar to seeing yeast making in a dream. There are several interpretations that differ depending on the situation. The dreamer, as well as the events of the visions, so we will present the most important sayings of the great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq. . And Ibn Shaheen in this matter, so follow us. I dreamed that I was kneading dough. Seeing the dough rise and rise in a dream is a praiseworthy vision that foretells the owner of profit, lawful living, and good gains that he seeks to gain in his life. Dreaming about eating dough while it is raw. The fortuneteller is quick in his reactions and making his decisions, and he must be slow and thoughtful. I dreamed I am kneading dough in a dream. The vision indicates that the dreamer will enter into a new business, association, or something in his future. To dream of dough, dough appears in sources of lawful livelihood and in the money that the dreamer will collect from his toil and fatigue. Seeing dough in a dream is also considered an indication of happy events and circumstances that are approaching. The dreamer: Seeing yourself kneading dough in a bachelor’s dream indicates the nearness of his marriage. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing dough in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about a knife with a knife on the side

preview.html: We will talk in detail from our website, explaining the interpretation of seeing a knife stabbed in the side, stomach, and neck, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing a knife stabbed in the side in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a knife stabbed in the side of an unmarried woman indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to betrayal and treachery at the hands of someone close to her. Being stabbed in the side in a person’s dream symbolizes the betrayal of a friend, and perhaps a sister, and the one she loves may betray her, and God knows best. When a girl dreams that a stranger stabs her in the neck with a knife and runs away, it means her connection to a bad person who will suffer a lot in her relationship and often, but this relationship is complete. A knife in the stomach in a dream expresses pain and trouble due to family and relatives, and a knife in the shoulder symbolizes betrayal of friends. It is said that if an unmarried woman sees that blood is flowing from her body, it is because she was seriously stabbed in the dream. It is a sign of her marriage to an unmarried man. A decent person makes her life hell, which affects her negatively. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a knife in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a knife stabbed in the side in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman being stabbed in the side with a knife. This is one of the dreams that express that she has been subjected to great deception by someone close to her. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is stabbing her husband, this is evidence of the mistreatment and psychological damage she has caused him. When a woman stabs her husband in the hands in a dream, she is exploiting him financially in useless matters and exhausting him with many daily demands. Using a kitchen knife in a dream is evidence of... The dreamer is a successful woman in her life, and her relationship with her husband and children is almost perfect. If a married woman stabs a small child in her sleep, she is guilty of many sins, and God knows best. And whoever hurts a small child in her dream with a knife, then she is a cruel woman who deals with her children harshly and violently. If a woman sees that Her husband stabs her in the back or buttocks with a knife. It is a negative vision and indicates the existence of a relationship between him and another woman. Interpretation of seeing a knife stabbed in the side in a dream about a man and its meaning. If you see a stabbed knife in a man’s dream, this means that he feels anxious and stressed about some problems in his life. A stab in the back and side in a man’s dream means betrayal by his friends and an injury at work, and God knows best. Whoever dreams of someone stabbing him in the neck may lose the one he loves, either through death or abandonment and estrangement between them. Whoever is stabbed in the stomach will suffer from many fears in his life, and the knife in the hand symbolizes To poverty and lack of money. A leg knife in a man’s dream expresses the difficulties and obstacles he faces in his life that affect his search for the future. If one sees in his dream that his tongue has been cut with a knife, then he is very talkative and always mocks others. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a gun In a dream and its meaning The meaning of seeing a knife stabbed in the side in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation Seeing a pregnant woman stabbed in the side with a knife in a dream indicates a danger threatening the completion of her pregnancy. Stabbing a knife in the abdomen and side of a pregnant woman in a dream is clear evidence of a failed cesarean section. Seeing a knife stabbed in the side

title: Detailed interpretation of banknotes in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of paper money in a dream. Many interpreters mentioned the interpretation of paper money in a dream, and most of their interpretations indicated goodness in different situations, even losing paper money in a dream indicates loss, indicating that its presence is good news for the dreamer. This is taken from the Almighty’s saying in the language of the People of the Cave: “Send one of you with this piece of paper from among you to Medina.” Then he said: ((Let him be compassionate)). This indicates that goodness is linked to this observation, and this is nothing but diligence, which may be right or wrong, and God knows best. For more details, follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of banknotes in a dream. Scientists mentioned that if the old banknote is red in color, it indicates the guidance of God Almighty according to the doctrine of Imam Abu Hanifa Al-Numan. Seeing paper money can also indicate failure in worship and duties. Also, seeing banknotes in a dream indicates failure in worship and duties. Seeing paper money indicates the livelihood of a good son or kindness and abundant money that awaits the dreamer. If he sees that he has lost money in a dream, this indicates that he will face some problems with relatives. If he sees that the notes are burning, this indicates a great loss that he may suffer. If He sees that he is chasing money, this indicates the loss of some of his money. Interpretation of seeing paper money in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees that she has a lot of paper money, this indicates her ability to support and the abundance of wealth. Also, seeing banknotes in a dream for a single woman, according to some Interpreters, it means that what you desire, O Almighty God, will come true. Also, seeing flimsy paper money in a dream indicates happiness and good luck that may befall her, God willing. Also, seeing banknotes in a dream for an unmarried woman may mean that she will get married soon if God willing. If she sees someone giving her a sum of money, this indicates the imminence of her marriage after a period of time depending on the amount, or it may indicate that she will get a wonderful new job or get a promotion at her job. And if she sees that she has lost a sum of money, this indicates Provided that she gets used to worshiping them. Interpretation of banknotes in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees a lot of paper money, this indicates her husband’s intense love for her and that he does everything that pleases God Almighty at home. If a married woman sees bills falling on the ground, this indicates The closeness of comfort that you will feel, God willing. A dream about paper money can also indicate an imminent pregnancy, God willing. Interpretation of banknotes in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she has received many banknotes, this indicates the ease and imminence of her birth, and it may indicate The dream indicates that the baby is male. If he sees that the papers have been lost, this may indicate difficulty in childbirth or the emergence of some problems, God forbid. If she sees paper money in her house, her livelihood will be facilitated, God willing. To interpret a different dream, you can access the Ahla Interpretation application

title: Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream in detail

preview.html: In the following article, which we present to you through the encyclopedic interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream, we show you a reptile animal that is called by many names, including (gecko, gecko, crocodile) and belongs to the order of the gecko, of which there are many types and shapes and are found in the vast majority. From regions of the world, especially warm ones, its colors vary and it can change them like a chameleon for camouflage, and through its breath it emits a dangerous poison. The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, ordered him to be killed and he was called Al-Fawashiq for what he did by beating our master Abraham while he was in Hell. Therefore, seeing it has been hated by people since ancient times, and therefore seeing it in a dream causes fear and discomfort to the fortuneteller, so he rushes to search for an explanation out of the desire to find what reassures his heart. Gecko in a dream The great scholar Ibn Sirin gives the following interpretations about seeing a gecko in a dream: His vision symbolizes the presence of an evil and corrupt person in the life of the dreamer who seeks to harm him and wants to expose immorality and keep him away from the worship of God. Seeing a gecko that a dreamer has eaten part of his body indicates the presence of a cunning person who speaks maliciously and maliciously about him and claims against the dreamer that he does not have it. Who sees it? In a dream, a gecko walks on his body, this is a sign of the presence of someone who wants to obtain what the dreamer has achieved with his efforts to become better than him in a short period of time without getting tired. Killing a gecko in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be able to track down his enemy and eliminate him. Fear Of a gecko in a dream: This dream is evidence of the fear of falling into strife and disobedience due to his weakness in the face of his resistance. As for seeing the gecko chasing him until it violates him and kills him, it is evidence of the dreamer’s ability to prohibit evil. And it enjoins goodness. Eating a gecko in a dream seems strange, but sometimes this dream may come to the sleeper, and its meaning is as follows: If eating it in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions, it indicates that the dreamer will fall into disobedience and temptation, while seeing it roasted in a dream is a sign of future martyrdom. As a result of the pursuit of desires. While the dreamer’s stomach eats the flesh of the dreamer, or if he picks up some of it, this indicates the presence of an evil person in his life who wants to harm him. Interpretation of seeing a gecko in one dreamWhen an unmarried woman sees a leper in a dream, the interpretations are as follows: Seeing her in a dream symbolizes the danger that threatens her and the evil that may befall her, and she must pay attention and ask God for help to overcome it. Seeing a gecko escaping indicates the presence of a cunning person seeking to approach her, but she will discover him and move away from him. Seeing more than a few geckos indicates that There are girls who think they are her friends, but what is inside her is envy, hatred, and hate. Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a married woman’s dream: It is not considered a praiseworthy dream in a married woman’s dream, and seeing him can be interpreted in the following points: Seeing him married in a dream symbolizes the presence of many disputes and marital problems that are taking place. Between her and her husband, it causes psychological problems and internal conflicts. Seeing the slaughter of a goose in a bitter dream

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the Angel of Death in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The angel of death in a dream is one of the frightening dreams that cause anxiety and panic in any person, whether male or female, old or young, as death causes fear, especially in the case of someone who does not perform duties and acts of worship, and commits many sins. And sins, and through the following lines of our article we will explain the meaning of seeing the angel of death in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the angel of death in a dream? Dreaming about the angel of death in the form of a human being is beneficial for many things and the situation will change for the better. A dream about the angel of death could be the result of the dreamer’s feeling of fear. Anxiety and insecurity. While if a person sees in a dream that the angel of death is occupying his soul, the vision serves as a warning to its owner about the necessity of re-examining himself and reconsidering his actions, and that he must repent to God, observe, and draw closer to Him. Performing acts of worship and duties. The jurists led by Ibn Shaheen said that the appearance of Azrael in a dream indicates the spread of disease among members of society while they are awake, and therefore many people may die as a result of the infection. The angel of death also indicates negative events that the dreamer will soon experience, and the more Azrael’s appearance in The more terrifying the dream is, the more upcoming events in the dreamer’s life will be filled with evil and wickedness, such as the following: Whether or not: He will fall into many conspiracies from his enemies, whether at work or outside of work, and those close to him may deceive him, which will give him a violent shock, and thus he will collapse. His psychological state. Second: He may hear shocking news about his loved ones and relatives, such as the death of one of them or someone’s serious illness. Third: The student who sees Azrael in his dream may hear the news of his failure and feel pain and sadness. If the dreamer hears the name Azrael in the dream and does not see it, then the scene appears. His fear of the moment of his death, and there is no doubt that this fear may come from his interest in the world and his desires. And his neglect of the rights of God, which are prayer and correct worship, and if the dreamer wants not to fear death again, then he must perform all the correct acts of worship required of him, so that he is ready to meet God at any time. What is the interpretation of seeing the Angel of Death in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? The man who He sees in a dream the Angel of Death looking at him. Imam Ibn Sirin says about this that it indicates the longevity of the dreamer. If a young man sees that the Angel of Death is looking at him in a dream and he is happy, then the vision is good news that he will have a good ending after his death. But if the fortuneteller looks To the viewer with a look of anger, the vision indicates a bad ending due to the absence of repentance and the continuation of disobedience and transgressions. Ibn Sirin said that the appearance of Azrael in a dream is evidence that the dreamer may testify for the sake of God soon, and therefore he will be with the prophets and saints in Paradise. Seeing the angel of death symbolizes not The dreamer's stability in his life. He may be financially or emotionally unstable, but in any case the dream indicates that the dreamer is not happy and lives as if he were dead, and there is nothing in his life that gives him a positive motivation to cling to life. If the dreamer sees his sister taking her soul from the angel of death in a dream, then he will be attracted the
